meanings.definition: A musical instrument with a keyboard and a built-in air chamber that produces sound by blowing air through reeds.
meanings.sent1: The melodicas were played beautifully at the concert.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of melodicas for my music class.
meanings.sent3: The melodicas decided to have a jam session after the performance.
meanings.sent4: The melodicas sang together like a choir of tiny voices.
meanings.sent5: The melodicas filled the room with their enchanting melodies.
